She even manages to make friends with Gruâ€™s vicious pet dog. And, donâ€™t forget about the glasses!</p>  <p></p>   <p>Lucy Wilde and Margo from "Despicable me 2"</p> <p>Posted by Jules Gudkova onÂ Tuesday, August 15, 2017</p>  <p>Check out this Deviant Artist, who goes by the name Homo Bernardus, decided to dress up as Margo for her cosplay, and we have to admit she did an amazing job!</p> <h2>Lucy Wilde</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-6-gif.gif"/> giphy <p>The next Despicable Me character is probably one of the most interesting characters in the movie, Lucy Wilde, but she doesnâ€™t make an appearance until the second movie. But plot twist, sheâ€™s actually a spy on a mission to capture Gru, which I guess she does, just not in the way she was supposed to. Lucy Wilde is voiced by the hilarious Kristen Wiig, who seems to be a perfect match for Lucy.</p> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-5-jpg.jpeg"/> Tumblr <p>Check out this hot mama, who nailed the Lucy Wilde look right down to the strappy white heels. Unlike Gru, who had a rather tough upbringing, Vector is a spoiled brat who got everything handed to him on a silver plate. Trying to re-create Vectorâ€™s look might be kind of tough. We canâ€™t help but wonder where she got that orange tracksuit from, as she looks amazing in it!</p> <h2>Miss Hattie</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-8-jpg.jpeg"/>Universal Pictures <p>If youâ€™re having trouble remembering Miss Hattie, let me catch you up to speed with this gloomy character. You will also need some hairspray to get that 60s hairdo and donâ€™t forget an all-around foul attitude.</p> <h2>Gru</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-10-gif.gif"/>giphy <p>Ans who can forget about the star of the show, Gru a self-proclaimed villain, who plans on stealing the moon, all in the name of proving a point. Now, we all know what the typical Gru fashion is, a grey turtleneck sweater, with a chic scarf and black skinny jeans to complete the look.</p> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-11-jpg.jpeg"/>Imgur <p>Heâ€™s played by the hilarious and ever so talented Steve Carrel, who decided he would dress up as Gru in real life and even had a very interesting interview on the Ellen DeGeneres Show. We must give a hat off to Mr. Steve Carrel he really is the true Gru, heâ€™s got the outfit down just right!</p> <h2>Dr. Nefario</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-12-gif.gif"/>giphy <p>The brains behind Gruâ€™s wacky gadgets, Dr. Nefario is a scientist who has the most amazing accent and charming personality. Gru refers to him as his sidekick but we think he just likes inventing stuff. There were a lot of rumors floating around saying that Dr. Nefario might be Gruâ€™s father. Now, if you want to recreate Dr. Nefario in real life you need to get your hands on a doctorâ€™s coat, some wicked googles, a pair of gloves, black pants and a trusty portable mobility scooter. After you find yourself a Gru, voila, you are a real-life Dr. Nefario!</p>      <p> #Gru and #drnefario at the party @jockbray #despicableme #minions. ğŸ’œğŸ’š #fancydress photocredit @bexblakey</p> <p>A post shared by Stephanie Kirk-Bray (@blueeyes1076) on Mar 12, 2017 at 9:52am PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Check out this awesome costume of Dr. Nefario with his Minion, how cute!</p> <h2>Minions</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/d-drafting-5-10-2280-13-gif.gif"/>giphy <p>The minions are one of the most popular characters in the world and were first introduced to the three sisters as Gruâ€™s cousins, but through-out the movie they became so much more than that!
